title: Easy Baked Polenta
subtitle: Creamy, lump-free polenta without stirring
description: A hands-off version of traditional creamy polenta, baked in the oven and enriched with Parmesan and butter.
instructions: Adjust oven rack to middle position and heat oven to 375°F.
Combine water, polenta, salt, and pepper in a 13 by 9-inch baking dish.
Transfer dish to oven and bake, uncovered, until water is absorbed and polenta has thickened, about 60 minutes.
Remove baking dish from oven and whisk in Parmesan and butter until polenta is smooth and creamy.
